content: आचार्यक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Originating from a spiritual preceptor; <ls>P. IV. 2. 104</ls> <ab>Vārt.</ab> --कं {@--1@} Instruction, tuition, teaching (lessons &c.); लंकास्त्रीणां पुनश्चक्रे विलापाचार्यकं शरैः <ls>R. 12. 78</ls>; आचार्यकं विजयि मान्मथमाविरासीत् <ls>Māl. 1. 26</ls>; <ls>Bv. 4. 37.</ls> {@--2@} The proficiency of a spiritual teacher.
